t:
“Daddy, how do you spell 'butterfly'?” the little girl asked.


“That's easy,” I whispered, sliding the planchette around the ouija board. “B-U-T-T-E-R-F-L-Y.”
c:
The girl looked at me with a sad expression. “Daddy, why did you kill us?”



#horror #twist #ouijaboard #ghost #father #daughter #spell #communication
